sentences.english: Have you ever bought toys at a fast food restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经在一个快餐店里买过玩具吗？

sentences.english: Can we stop using the unrecyclable style of lunch boxes?
sentences.chinese: 我们能否停止使用不可回收的快餐盒？

sentences.english: Judy earned money for her college education by slinging hash in a fast-food restaurant during the summer.
sentences.chinese: 朱蒂夏季在快餐店里端盘子赚上大学的学费。

sentences.english: And then we'll need to eat them PDQ, too!
sentences.chinese: 我们改去麦当劳吧，快餐店应该不会等太久。

sentences.english: If you do eat at a fast-food restaurant, ask for the nutrition information and choose lower-sodium items.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在吃快餐店，要求对营养信息和选择低钠项目。

sentences.english: I consider Vietnamese pho, Middle Eastern shawarmas and all that stuff to be fast food as well.
sentences.chinese: 我认为越南米线，中东烤肉也算是快餐。

sentences.english: Fast food restaurants are popular now.
We were planning on just having a snack and catching the early train.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算吃份快餐然后去赶早班火车。

sentences.english: That fast food business have expanded through the sale of franchise .
sentences.chinese: 该快餐店通过出售联营经销权而扩大了生意。

sentences.english: This contribution sought to discover consumer behavior pattern of fast food nutrition in Slovakia.
sentences.chinese: 这发现亦显示出在斯国快餐食品的消费行为模式。

sentences.english: She had eaten a hamburger at a California fast-food chain.
sentences.chinese: 她在加利福尼亚的快餐连锁店吃了一个汉堡。

sentences.english: I've been thinking about opening a fast-food restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在考虑开个快餐店。

sentences.english: Variations on the fast food restaurant concept include fast casual restaurants and catering trucks.
sentences.chinese: 变化的快餐店的概念包括快速休闲餐厅和餐饮车。

sentences.english: I often go to the fast-food restaurant.
Sam sees a " Help Wanted" sign outside a fast-food restaurant and goes inside.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆在一家快餐店外看到一则招聘启事，他走进店里。

sentences.english: Its name is Johnson International Fastfood Co. Limited.
sentences.chinese: 公司名称是“约翰逊国际快餐有限公司”。

definition: to go/take out (relates to food bought at a restaurant)
hot spicy soup (often sold in street stalls)
